title: Influence of repeated mastitis on the milk production and metabolic status in the subsequent lactation period of dairy cattle
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Shiho Miyata, Lijie Fan, Jun Kambe, Mohammad Ibrahim Qasimi, Satoshi Takemoto, Masahiko Ito, Chunmei Li, Yuki Yamamoto, Kentaro Nagaoka
